CreateBackendEnvironment.name: CreateBackendEnvironment
CreateBackendEnvironment.description: Creates a new backend environment for an Amplify App.

CreateBranch.name: CreateBranch
CreateBranch.description: Creates a new Branch for an Amplify App.

CreateDeployment.name: CreateDeployment
CreateDeployment.description: Create a deployment for manual deploy apps. (Apps are not connected to repository)

CreateDomainAssociation.name: CreateDomainAssociation
CreateDomainAssociation.description: Create a new DomainAssociation on an App

CreateWebHook.name: CreateWebHook
CreateWebHook.description: Create a new webhook on an App.

DeleteApp.name: DeleteApp
DeleteApp.description: Delete an existing Amplify App by appId.

DeleteBackendEnvironment.name: DeleteBackendEnvironment
DeleteBackendEnvironment.description: Deletes a branch for an Amplify App.

DeleteBranch.name: DeleteBranch
DeleteBranch.description: Deletes a branch for an Amplify App.

DeleteJob.name: DeleteJob
DeleteJob.description: Delete a job, for an Amplify branch, part of Amplify App.

GenerateAccessLogs.name: GenerateAccessLogs
GenerateAccessLogs.description: Generate website access logs for a specific time range via a pre-signed URL.

GetApp.name: GetApp
GetApp.description: Retrieves an existing Amplify App by appId.

GetArtifactUrl.name: GetArtifactUrl
GetArtifactUrl.description: Retrieves artifact info that corresponds to a artifactId.

GetBackendEnvironment.name: GetBackendEnvironment
GetBackendEnvironment.description: Retrieves a backend environment for an Amplify App.

GetBranch.name: GetBranch
GetBranch.description: Retrieves a branch for an Amplify App.

GetDomainAssociation.name: GetDomainAssociation
GetDomainAssociation.description: Retrieves domain info that corresponds to an appId and domainName.

GetJob.name: GetJob
GetJob.description: Get a job for a branch, part of an Amplify App.

GetWebHook.name: GetWebHook
GetWebHook.description: Retrieves webhook info that corresponds to a webhookId.

ListArtifacts.name: ListArtifacts
ListArtifacts.description: List artifacts with an app, a branch, a job and an artifact type.

ListBackendEnvironments.name: ListBackendEnvironments
ListBackendEnvironments.description: Lists backend environments for an Amplify App.

ListBranches.name: ListBranches
ListBranches.description: Lists branches for an Amplify App.

ListJobs.name: ListJobs
ListJobs.description: List Jobs for a branch, part of an Amplify App.

StartDeployment.name: StartDeployment
StartDeployment.description: Start a deployment for manual deploy apps. (Apps are not connected to repository)

StartJob.name: StartJob
StartJob.description: Starts a new job for a branch, part of an Amplify App.

StopJob.name: StopJob
StopJob.description: Stop a job that is in progress, for an Amplify branch, part of Amplify App.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: This action tags an AWS Amplify Console resource.

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: This action removes a tag from an AWS Amplify Console resource.

UpdateBranch.name: UpdateBranch
UpdateBranch.description: Updates a branch for an Amplify App.

UpdateDomainAssociation.name: UpdateDomainAssociation
UpdateDomainAssociation.description: Update a DomainAssociation on an App.
